statements: UPDATE inventory_tracking SET current_stock = 50, min_stock_threshold = 10 WHERE product_id = 12345
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET min_stock_threshold = 5, product_name = 'New Product Name' WHERE product_id = 54321
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET current_stock = 50, min_stock_threshold = 10 WHERE product_id = 1
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET min_stock_threshold = current_stock + 5 WHERE product_id = 2
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 10, price = 25.50 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET quantity_ordered = 5, order_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE order_id = 100;
UPDATE inventory SET price = 15.99, quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE product_id = 1001;
UPDATE orders SET quantity_ordered = 10, order_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE order_id = 2005;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE Orders SET quantity_ordered = 10, total_price = 100.50 WHERE order_id = 101;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity + 5, price = price * 1.1 WHERE product_id = 1001;
UPDATE Orders SET total_price = quantity_ordered * (SELECT price FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = Orders.product_id) WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET total_price = 150.75, quantity_sold = 5 WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 10, price = price * 1.05 WHERE product_id = 1001;
UPDATE customers SET contact_number = '+1-555-123-4567', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 2003;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 20, unit_price = 15.99 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE Customers SET phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 201
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 100, unit_price = 15.99 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE Customers SET phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 201;
